name: DeveloperTutorial('ZerotoHero')
0:
”Alexa, start Developer Tutorial”
”Alexa, open Developer Tutorial”
”Alexa, ask Developer Tutorial for help”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: developer tutorial
des:
On screen based devices this skill will open a free Amazon video tutorial "Zero to Hero" from the YouTube Alexa Developers channel introducing the concepts of Alexa Skill development.

For overwiev and introduction you may also want to read the following Blog Entry from German Viscuso:

https://developer.amazon.com/en-GB/blogs/alexa/alexa-skills-kit/2020/02/introducing-zero-to-hero-a-comprehensive-course-to-building-an-alexa-skill
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
